__e: You know, in my experience, if you're patient, sooner or later, the people who need to talk will seek you out, often under the guise of some other intention.
I believe that in time, they will come to believe that this is true.
All that the Father given to me shall come to me. And him that cometh to me, I will in no wise cast out.
When they come out for us you get in the car and go.
We have friends, family, they will come looking for us, they know where we are, they find us.
Besides, even if they do when they don't see us they'll come and find us
If you say we're leaving, they're going to come and kill us both.
- If you tell me where we are, my friends will come,and they'll save us.
Besides, even if they do when they don't see us they'll come and find us
Perhaps that there is which will not come, you want to try?
I'm not sure if you heard, but they won't come if they're sitting next to each other.
They're not gonna come for me. People don't do that.
He knows that they're going to have to come... and they're going to have to take her away... and then they'll come, and they'll take me away... and then they'll come, and they'll take you away!
Why, someday a mama and a papa will come to the orphanage... looking for a pretty little girl just like you.
'Cause the next time they come up here could be the last time I see you.
And if you don't go there then they will come here.
You'll find other planes looking for me - if I happen to be delayed.
And when they come looking for me, you can't be here, either.
You'll find other planes looking for me - if I happen to be delayed.
